description:
George is a strange old man that http://anidb.net/ch142876 [Kazamatsuri Kanshi] runs into during the school field trip. Apparently he and http://anidb.net/ch148622 [his girlfriend] were the ones that started the legend about the so-called "love-knot tree" (enmusubi no ki 縁結びの木).
It turns out that it is a different tree from the one everyone thinks.
name: George
